Interface SelectionListenableGraph<V,E>

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.jgrapht.Graph<V,E>, GraphPropertyListenableGraph<V,E>, org.jgraph.event.GraphSelectionListener, org.jgrapht.ListenableGraph<V,E>, ViewableGraph<V,E>
All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectedGraph, UndirectedGraph
public interface SelectionListenableGraph<V,E>
extends ViewableGraph<V,E>, org.jgraph.event.GraphSelectionListener

This interface extends ViewableGraph in order to make it possible to listen for selectionevents for that graph.

Author:
ordyniak
